title: June 2006 - Socialist Standard.pdf
description:
Monthly magazine, includes - editorial &#039;World Cup fever&#039;, &#039;The BNP Advances&#039; (far-right in Britain), &#039;Exporting Crime&#039; (ex-prisoners from abroad and xenophobia), &#039;Prejudice and Equality&#039; (legislating to change attitudes?), &#039;Japan : A Woman for Emperor?&#039; (gender inequality and implications for democracy), J K Galbraith : A Radical Keynesian, &#039;Panic Aboard SS New Labour&#039;
plus reviews, letters, etc.
